question: There are 158 third-graders at Maple Grove School. 51 of them are girls. On Wednesday, 6 third-grade girls and 2 third-grade boys were absent. How many third grade boys were at Maple Grove School on Wednesday?
answer:
Of the 158 third graders, 51 are girls, so 158 students - 51 girls = <<158-51=107>>107 boys.
On Wednesday there were 107 boys - 2 absent = <<107-2=105>>105 boys.
#### 105
